original_title: The Krays: The Myth Behind the Legend
overview: Rivals and other contemporaries discuss Ronnie and Reggie Kray, the notoriously violent gangsters who ran London's East End in the 1950s and '60s.
tagline: Discover the truth about two of the most glamorous but brutal London gangsters of the 1950s and 60s.
title: The Krays: The Myth Behind the Legend
